scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: All rural households in taluka, Gujarat are reported to have received clean cooking fuel connections under Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana).
report_text: Media fact-checks reveal that toilets built under the program are not functional or lack water and maintenance, undermining ODF claims. Electric meters installed but supply often limited to a few hours.

claim_text: Under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana, every eligible beneficiary in West Bengal has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: Survey data is inconclusive; official dashboards show coverage but independent sample surveys indicate uneven implementation across the district.

claim_text: All rural households in urban slum, Madhya Pradesh are reported to have received clean cooking fuel connections under National Health Mission.
report_text: Independent monitoring found electricity connections installed and many households reporting regular supply in several villages. Local administrators confirmed household-level connections during surprise checks.

claim_text: Smart city projects under Jal Jeevan Mission have made the municipal services fully digital and integrated in Assam.
report_text: On-ground checks show that toilets were constructed in the majority of households in targeted areas and ODF status has improved. Local administrators confirmed household-level connections during surprise checks.

claim_text: Atmanirbhar Bharat has eliminated open defecation in most areas of Kerala and constructed toilets in all target households.
report_text: Independent monitoring found electricity connections installed and many households reporting regular supply in several villages. Local administrators confirmed household-level connections during surprise checks.

claim_text: Smart city projects under Atmanirbhar Bharat have made the municipal services fully digital and integrated in Haryana.
report_text: The claim is partially supported by some administrative records, but local interviews and sample checks show variations that raise uncertainty.

claim_text: Digital India claims that farmer beneficiaries in Kerala have received timely financial assistance under the scheme.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in Kerala have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Electric meters installed but supply often limited to a few hours.

claim_text: All rural households in rural block, Madhya Pradesh are reported to have received clean cooking fuel connections under MGNREGA.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in Madhya Pradesh have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Road construction stalled due to contractor disputes and monsoon damage.

scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: The health initiative Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana) has set up the required number of primary health centres in Punjab and increased service coverage.
report_text: On-ground checks show that toilets were constructed in the majority of households in targeted areas and ODF status has improved. Beneficiary interviews corroborated receipt of benefits and regular services.

claim_text: Under Smart Cities Mission, every eligible beneficiary in Kerala has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in Kerala have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Electric meters installed but supply often limited to a few hours.

claim_text: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao claims that farmer beneficiaries in Gujarat have received timely financial assistance under the scheme.
report_text: A field investigation in urban slum, Gujarat found many households still without functioning piped water connections; supply remains intermittent. Many households reported receiving taps but no running water.

claim_text: Under Atmanirbhar Bharat, every eligible beneficiary in West Bengal has been provided the intended subsidy/transfers.
report_text: Local surveys confirm that a large majority of eligible families in West Bengal received the promised benefits and subsidies under Atmanirbhar Bharat. Beneficiary interviews corroborated receipt of benefits and regular services.

claim_text: The health initiative PM-KISAN has set up the required number of primary health centres in Bihar and increased service coverage.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in Bihar have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Road construction stalled due to contractor disputes and monsoon damage.

claim_text: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana has achieved 100% coverage of targeted children for nutrition interventions in selected districts of Rajasthan.
report_text: Official numbers and local reports diverge; further verification on selected samples is required to confirm the extent of coverage.

claim_text: The health initiative Atmanirbhar Bharat has set up the required number of primary health centres in Gujarat and increased service coverage.
report_text: On-ground checks show that toilets were constructed in the majority of households in targeted areas and ODF status has improved. Third-party monitors reported improved service indicators this year.
